HeroGame

Class Team

    • HeroGame.Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    Team Class for Heroes & Villains Game SENG201 2018S1
    Author:
    Andy Holden & Alex Liggett

        public int removeMember(int heroIndex)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • checkNameUnique

        public boolean checkNameUnique(java.lang.String name)
        Checks the Team to see whether a particular name has already been allocated
        Returns:
        a boolean false if the name has been allocated, true if it is unique

      • checkPresent

        public boolean checkPresent(HeroType heroTypeInQuestion)
        Checks whether a particular HeroType is present in the Team
        Parameters:
        heroTypeInQuestion - a HeroType the HeroType to check
        Returns:
        a boolean true if the heroTypeInQuestion is present, else false

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(Hero heroInQuestion)
        Gets the index of a particular Hero, so that they can be removed or have a health bonus applied from outside the class
        Parameters:
        heroInQuestion - a Hero the hero whose index is required
        Returns:
        an int the position of the hero in question in the memberList array If member is not present, returns -1

public java.lang.String listHeroes()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns (and prints to output) a list of heroes in the team and their index. Command Line Version Only
        Returns:
        a String the list of heroes in the Team

      • getHero

        public Hero getHero(int heroIndex)
        for a valid index, returns the Hero at a given index in the private memberList array
        Parameters:
        heroIndex - an int the index of the required Hero
        Returns:
        the Hero at the given index. Returns a null pointer otherwise

      • teamStatus

public void teamStatus()
        Deprecated. 
        Print to output a list of the current Team members, their special ability and their current strength.

      • addPowerUp

        public int addPowerUp(PowerUpType powerUp)
        Adds a PowerUp type to the team's inventory. Additional instances are added using changeAmount()
        Parameters:
        powerUp - a PowerUp, the PowerUp type to add to the team's inventory.

      • removePowerUp

        Parameters:

      • applyPowerUp

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String applyPowerUp(PowerUpType powerUpType,
                                                 int teamMemberIndex)
        Deprecated. 
        Makes the Hero at index teamMember eat a PowerUp of the given type. Removes the first power up of this type from the team's inventory. Fundamental change to PowerUps/HealingItems means this method is no longer relevant/correct
        Parameters:
        powerUpType - a power up type, the type of power up to apply
        teamMemberIndex - an int the index of the team member who is to eat the power up

      • showPowerUps

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String showPowerUps()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a list of the PowerUps in the team's inventory. Fundamental change to PowerUps/HealingItems means this method is no longer relevant/correct.
        Returns:
        a String a list of quantities of each power up carried by the team

      • getPowerUpType

        public PowerUpType getPowerUpType(int powerUpIndex)
        Returns the type of power up found at a given index of the power ups ArrayList
        Parameters:
        powerUpIndex - an int the index of the power up for which the type is required
        Returns:
        a PowerUpType the PowerUpType at the given index in the ArrayList

      • listPowerUps

        public java.lang.String listPowerUps()
        Method to get a list of power ups the team currently has in html format
        Returns:
        String, list of power ups

      • addHealingItem

        public int addHealingItem(HealingItemType healingItemType)
        Adds a healing item to the team's inventory. If nurse is present in team, healing power of item doubles
        Parameters:
        healingItem - a HealingItem, the healing item to add to the team's inventory

      • removeHealingItem

        public int removeHealingItem(int healingItemIndex)
        Removes the healing at a given index from the list
        Parameters:
        healingItemIndex - an int, the index of the healing item to remove in the ArrayList of healing items

      • applyHealingItem

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String applyHealingItem(HealingItemType healingItemType,
                                                     int teamMemberIndex)
        Deprecated. 
        Makes the team member at index teamMember drink a healing item of the given type. Removes the first healing item of this type from the team's inventory. Fundamental change to PowerUps/HealingItems means this method is no longer relevant/correct.
        Parameters:
        healingItemType - a HealingItemType, the type of healing item to apply
        teamMemberIndex - an int the index of the team member who is to drink the healing item

      • getHealingItemType

        public HealingItemType getHealingItemType(int healingItemIndex)
        Returns the type of the healing item at the given index
        Parameters:
        healingItemIndex - an int the index of the healing item for which the type will be returned
        Returns:
        a HealingItemType the type of healing item at the given index in the healing items ArrayList

public java.lang.String showHealingItems()

        Returns a String listing the quantities of each healing item in the team's inventory. Fundamental change to PowerUps/HealingItems means this method is no longer relevant/correct.
        Returns:
        a multiline String a list of the qunatities of each healing item in the team's inventory

      • getMoney

        public double getMoney()
        Prints to output and returns the amount of money the team has
        Returns:
        a double the amount of money the team has

      • changeMoney

        public double changeMoney(double moneyChange)
        Chnages the amount of money the team has by a positive or negative amount. The value of money has a 'floor' of $0.00
        Parameters:
        moneyChange - a double the amount the teams money changes by
        Returns:
        a double the amount of money the team now has

      • startClock

        Starts the game clock by setting the value of startTime to the current system time
